name: Vegan Pumpkin Burger
description: This vegan pumpkin burger with lamb's lettuce, mushrooms, pomegranate, and garlic mayonnaise is just perfect for fall! Super healthy and insanely delicious!
recipeIngredient: 4  whole grain buns with sunflower seeds

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the ground flaxseeds with the water and let it sit for at least 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Combine the ground flaxseeds with the water and let it sit for at least 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat some oil in a medium-sized pan and sauté the onion and the garlic for 2-3 minutes. Set aside. Heat some more oil and sear the mushrooms for about 3 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat some oil in a medium-sized pan and sauté the onion and the garlic for 2-3 minutes. Set aside. Heat some more oil and sear the mushrooms for about 3 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Mash the chickpeas with a fork, leaving some intact for texture. In a bowl, combine the chickpeas, the pumpkin puree, and the oats. Add the Italian seasoning, the paprika powder, the mustard, the flaxseed-water mixture, and the sautéd onion and the garlic. Season with salt and pepper. Form four burger patties.
recipeInstructions.name: Mash the chickpeas with a fork, leaving some intact for texture. In a bowl, combine the chickpeas, the pumpkin puree, and the oats. Add the Italian seasoning, the paprika powder, the mustard, the flaxseed-water mixture, and the sautéd onion and the garlic. Season with salt and pepper. Form four burger patties.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat some oil and cook the patties for about 2-3 minutes on each side. Put the vegan mayonnaise in a small bowl and stir in the minced garlic.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat some oil and cook the patties for about 2-3 minutes on each side. Put the vegan mayonnaise in a small bowl and stir in the minced garlic.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the pumpkin pattties on whole wheat buns with lamb's lettuce, mushrooms, garlic mayonnaise, and top with them with pomegranate seeds. Serve with potato wedges.
